definition: Black Whirlwind, nickname of 李逵[Li3 Kui2], known for his fearsome behavior in combat and his dark complexion

sentences.english: Three-dimensional cyclone , naked eye visual , Newman D40 naked eye 3D player.
sentences.chinese: 立体旋风，裸眼直观，纽曼D40裸眼3D播放器。

sentences.english: A swoosh doesn’t make it good design. It’s just lazy.
sentences.chinese: 旋风产非好的设计，而是一种懒惰。

sentences.english: The three-dimension gas-particle flow in a spiral cyclone is simulated numerically.
sentences.chinese: 对螺旋型旋风分离器进行了两相流场的三维数值模拟。

sentences.english: Discharging process of slate valve has been studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对旋风筒翻板阀卸料过程进行了分析。

sentences.english: Of king of small good fortune " tornado leg " only " boy result " ability is broken blast.
sentences.chinese: 小福王的“旋风腿”唯有“童子功”才能破阵。

sentences.english: A whirlwind catches me in midair and places me safely on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 一阵旋风在半空中把我托住，使我安全返回地面。

sentences.english: A day, stockaded village is ab extra one ace, be called Hong Wei, tornado sword is fierce and clinking.
sentences.chinese: 一天，寨外来了一高手，名叫洪威，旋风剑厉害无比。

sentences.english: But I scattered them with a whirlwind among all the nations whom they knew not.
sentences.chinese: 我必以旋风吹散他们到素不认识的万国中。

sentences.english: The designs of cyclone and Venturi are presented.
sentences.chinese: 介绍旋风除尘与文丘里洗涤器的设计选型。

sentences.english: The results showed that the precessing vortex core (PVC) phenomenon existed in all axial positions of the cyclone separator.
sentences.chinese: 结果表明，旋风分离器全空间内都存在旋进涡核现象。

sentences.english: Fire whirl is a kind of special fire behavior that usually occurs in forest fires.
sentences.chinese: 火旋风是森林火灾中经常发生的一种特殊火行为。

sentences.english: O my God, make them like a wheel; as the stubble before the wind.
sentences.chinese: 求你使他们像旋风卷起的草，像风前的碎秸。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a whirlwind flash drier, which belongs to a high-speed airflow drier.
sentences.chinese: 一种旋风式闪蒸干燥机，属于快速气流干燥设备。

sentences.english: The helical cover is connected with the screws on the body or the block buttons.
sentences.chinese: 其旋风盖与桶体螺钉连接或卡扣连接。

sentences.english: Using whirlwind while dual wielding now deals damage from both mainhand and offhand weapons.
sentences.chinese: 双持时使用旋风现在主手和副手武器都能产生伤害。

sentences.english: The first few months will be marked, characteristically , by a tourbillon of activity.
sentences.chinese: 活力的旋风将给前期的几个月打上极具特征的记号。

definition: storm/violent commotion/fig. crisis (e.g. revolution, uprising, financial crisis etc)
to engulf/to sweep/to carry away everything
to roll up/to curl up/(of dust etc) to swirl up
variant of 捲起|卷起[juan3 qi3]
see 龍捲風|龙卷风[long2 juan3 feng1]
